name: UN-RESTED
description:
Vlad is sick of the apocalypse, he can't get any rest with all these damn zombies around... time to take some action so he can get his beauty sleep!

Use WASD or arrows keys to move, Space to slash and E to release bats.

Kill all the enemies in the level to win!

Every level is randomly generated.

Created for the 2022 GameDev.TV game jam.

Apologies for how buggy and incomplete it is...time was not on my side this time!

**You will need to alt F4 to exit prior to menu screen (and maybe even in it)**
